table.name: vtigress_themes
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS vtigress_themes ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, name varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, filename varchar(100) NOT NULL, Status tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL, data text NOT NULL, draft int(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;
